bibl.title: The Date of the Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew (P. Magd. Gr. 17 = P64): A Response to C.P. Thiede.
bibl.note: P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 336 (2)). À propos de: Carsten Peter THIEDE, Papyrus Magdalen Greek 17 (Gregory-Aland P64). A Reappraisal, ZPE 105 (1995) pp. 13-20 et pl. IX; - Tyndale Bulletin 46 (1995) pp. 29-42. - Non vidimus.
bibl.seg: HEAD Peter M., The Date of the Magdalen Papyrus of Matthew (P. Magd. Gr. 17 = P64): A Response to C.P. Thiede.
